title: "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server" Mac Sierra
body: As of this morning, I have been unable to log onto any of my accounts on league, getting the message "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server" repeatedly. I'm on Mac and have not had any problems playing for the past couple of weeks. I've tried everything Riot (and pretty much everyone else) has suggested. I am currently running the most up to date version of Sierra.

replies.body:
This often occurs as a result of certain network settings that cause your connection to drop off prior to reaching out servers. I strongly encourage you to work through the steps inside our [Mac Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if that guide assisted in resolving this.
It unfortunately did not assist me. I have attempted everything listed in there and am still having this issue.

It sounds like there may be more complicated network issues going on that will require additional troubleshooting. I suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look. If you include a set of system logs using our [Hextech Tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)by attaching them to your ticket, it will help a lot!

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting that ticket.
